name: QuickCheck
description: QuickCheck is a random tesing tool. It attempts to find for what values a test or theorem prover will fail.

name: Nitpick
description: Nitpick is a counterexample generator for Isabelle/HOL

name: Nunchaku
description: Nunchaku is a counterexample generator intended to be the successor of Nitpick. It can be run with different theorem provers
